sentences.en: Both the cosmological constant and quintessence fall into the general category of dark energy.
sentences.cn: 不管是宇宙常数还是第五元素,都属于暗能量的?畴.

sentences.en: But what they are really attacking is the quintessence of Marxism.
sentences.cn: 但是他们所攻击的正是马克思主义的最根本的东西.

sentences.en: He is the quintessence oftact and politeness.
He was the quintessence of all that Eva most deeply loathed.
sentences.cn: 他是伊娃最深恶痛绝的那种人中的典型。

sentences.en: Her book captures the quintessence of Renaissance humanism.
sentences.cn: 她的书抓住了文艺复兴时期人文主义的精髓.

sentences.en: It keeps and fuses the national spirit and quintessence in national aesthetic consciousness and tradition design.
sentences.cn: 因为它保持和溶合了世代相袭流传下来的民族精神、民族审美意识以及传统图案中的精华.

sentences.en: It was the quintessence of an English manor house.
sentences.cn: 那是典型的英式庄园宅第。

sentences.en: It was the quintessence of an English manor house.
Jake is the quintessence of good manners.
John is the quintessence of good manners.
Peking Opera is the quintessence of Chinese culture!
sentences.cn: 京剧可是我们中国的国粹啊!

sentences.en: The theory of the dictatorship of the proletariat is the quintessence of Marxism.
sentences.cn: 无产阶级专政的理论是马克思主义的精髓.

sentences.en: This paragraph is the quintessence of the article.
To gaze out onto the above, to behold the quintessence of mind, the elegance of reality.
sentences.cn: 凝视上述展望, 注视思想的精髓和现实的优雅.

sentences.en: Turning round to look at Gumo Ridge It'struck me as the quintessence of autumn.
sentences.cn: 天,也比以前更加高远一些.回头向古陌岭上望去,秋色更浓了.

words.tran_cn: 精华；典范；第五元素（被视为地、水、火、风以外之构成宇宙的元素）

trans.tran_cn: 典范，完美典型，精华，精髓
trans.tran_en: Thequintessenceof something is the most perfect or typical example of it
